LanguageData.HatesDumbLabor.degreeDatas.0.label: hates dumb labor
LanguageData.HatesDumbLabor.degreeDatas.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef] detests manual labor, feeling that tasks such as cleaning and hauling are beneath [PAWN_objective]. [PAWN_pronoun] will perform such tasks more slowly than others would, and will also carry less per load when required to haul.
